settings.body_content_1: We believe that single use is no use and in 2018 we made a commitment to eradicate single use, non-degradable plastic at Finisterre. We didn’t just stop there, our sustainable packaging commitment covers everything from the swingtag to the bag you receive your order in.

settings.title: Aquapak x Finisterre Marine Safe Garment Bags

settings.body: Water soluble, recyclable, and biodegradable, our new Leave No Trace bags break down harmlessly into non-toxic biomass in soil and sea, should it escape into the environment. We partnered with Aquapak to create this innovative packaging solution, and in October 2019 we were proud to lead the way as the first in our industry to use this ground-breaking technology - eliminating the final piece of non-degradable plastic from our packaging.

You know those little plastic twigs which connect swingtags to product? Well, we’ve said goodbye to those little bits of plastic and gone back to good old string.  Our mailbags are made from unbleached kraft pulp, sourced from renewable FSC/PEFC compliant paper mills. They are both recyclable and compostable.   We switched to paper in the autumn of 2015 and by doing so we have prevented the creation of over 158,000 plastic bags to date.
settings.button_text: Find out more on the Broadcast...

settings.alt: mailbags are made from unbleached kraft pulp
